metadata.title: CVE-2021-47620 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: refactor malicious adv data checkCheck for out-of-bound read was being performed at the end of whilenum_reports loop, and would fill journal with false positives. Addedcheck to beginning of loop processing so that it doesn't get checkedafter ptr has been advanced.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
